name: Hubot-pops
body:
### Welcome to hubot-pops
My nickname is Pops and this is a little repo I created just to play around with hubot scripting. I enjoy learning new languages and especially learning how to do things "the right way." If you look at any of this code and see things that need improved from a language perspective, please let me know!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
